content.question: ​When a certain car is initially purchased, its value is <math alttext="20 , 000"><semantics><mn>20,000</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> dollars. If the car loses <math alttext="9 percent sign"><semantics><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> of its value each year, when will the car’s value be <math alttext="10 , 000"><semantics><mn>10,000</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> dollars?

choices.label: Between the date of the initial purchase and <math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> year

​Between <math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> year and <math alttext="2"><semantics><mn>2</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years after its initial purchase

Between <math alttext="5"><semantics><mn>5</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years and <math alttext="6"><semantics><mn>6</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years after its initial purchase

​Between <math alttext="7"><semantics><mn>7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years and <math alttext="8"><semantics><mn>8</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years after its initial purchase

content.answer: ​Between <math alttext="7"><semantics><mn>7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years and <math alttext="8"><semantics><mn>8</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> years after its initial purchase

topic.text: 2.2: Change in Linear and Exponential Functions

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
